    void
    successfulMessage(Message message)
    Called when a message has been successfully delivered This method calls cluster.informOfDelivery to signal to the cluster that the message has been delivered, removes the message from the send queue and takes care of notifying the client that we have delivered the message.

    • releaseMessagePort

      public void releaseMessagePort()
      Unbind the message port Note that this method unbinds ALL ports, not just the message port.

    • deliver

      public void deliver(Message message)
      Try to deliver a message This method tries to deliver a message asynchronously. On success it calls successfulMessage to signal that this is so.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to deliver

    • successfulMessage

      public void successfulMessage(Message message)
      Called when a message has been successfully delivered This method calls cluster.informOfDelivery to signal to the cluster that the message has been delivered, removes the message from the send queue and takes care of notifying the client that we have delivered the message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message

    • notifyClientOfDelivery

      public void notifyClientOfDelivery(Message message)
      Asynchronously tell a client that we delivered their message NOTE: this method ignores the state code of the client's response to this POST.
      Parameters:
      message - The message that was delivered
